post.body: @facit Everyone's twittering!
BB, I'm so sleepy.
Wah bloody hell. "Spoilers".
Who the fuck is this Prof River Song?!
Yeah, I was a bit freaked when I saw Silence in the Library too. Scared.
Wahlau, that is one annoying acronym. And I think I'm gonna finish Season 4 today. How fast am I!
NGL?
YES. And now I'm going to quote from Not Out of Hate. I love your books. Have you read mine?
Stare at the monitor all day, then go home and stare at the monitor all night.
wants my hair to dry so I can go sleep this off.
feels tired and empty.
Gmail is laggy.
SkinFood peach sake face mask. Mmm.
ponders the difference between a settlement agreement and a deed of settlement.
just made the weakest mug of Milo on the face of the planet.
HX: "When boss gets sai kang, it trickles down." Me: "The word 'trickle' is very apt."
is also really sleepy.
is thinking of stuff to move to the office. The mobile phone charger is one.
Doomsday rain at Raffles Place.
had a ribeye steak for lunch. Mmm. Growing fat though.
will have lunch at NYDC at the Heeren. Om nom nom nom.
Breakfast: egg mayo sandwich + beef sandwich + coffee.
Phone is dying and I don't have a charger in the office. Also, not sure if I can make dinner tonight.
cause w/3 action w/10 injunction
hates reading House of Lords' decisions. Everybody has to have a say.
is super busy today. This is madness. No, this is Pupillage!
My mother is ridiculous. She just came into my room and told me to go to sleep. WTF MOTHER.
Ooh, geek moment. They're using the Apple aluminium keyboard in S04E09 Forest of the Dead.
"I have the 2 qualities required to seek absolute truth: I am brilliant and unloved."
"This isn't the real me. This isn't my body. But I've been dieting."
is listening to Muse and thinking of Windy and feeling very sad.
"How is Harvey Wallbanger one word?!"
Wah, the Doctor's daughter is how chio.
Oh shit. They traded places.
A SKY OF FIRE, AND THEN CLEAR BLUE. BRILLIANT BRILLIANCE!
Teehee, gas masks = "Are you my mummy?"
"The bravery of idiots is bravery nonetheless."
is stocking up on stuff to watch, and writing stuff off the log.
S04E05: The Poison Sky.
"That is just so cool." "Is the temperature significant?"
is surfing all_macros, cat_macros and randompictures.
had mee rebus for lunch.
is starving and needs to pee.
is keying in page numbers.
is starving.
has 13 minutes to get my ass out of the house. SEE YA.
is heading into the office after all.
is not sure if I have to go into the office today. Conflicting instructions.
is still in the office.
is stiiiiill working.
is still working.
Finally! Lunch!
Almost dry. Going to sleep now. Goodnight.
Noby Noby Boy eats living things! I LIKE! Now I miss Katamari Damacy.
"Mild Fantasy Violence Animated Blood."
is again waiting for hair to dry. It's either now or an extra 15 mins in the bathroom in the morning.
can hardly keep my eyes open.
And tomorrow I will key in page numbers that will run into the thousands. Hello, record of appeal.
is going to compare documents for the rest of the afternoon.
Interns: "Don't you have assistants?" Us: "We are the assistants," or "You are our assistants."
cannot go to bed because my hair is damp.
watched Omniform at BluJaz.Spectacular!
is talking the band talk at 3am.
is writing the band bio. Hyacinth & Magazine on wordpress (http://tinyurl.com/92eyg6) and myspace (http://tinyurl.com/a83jfp).
sleeps too much on Fri and Sat night and ends up sleeping late on Sunday night.
"I'm a safecracker, darling / And I wanna pick the lock of love."
is almost done with the Knights of Prosperity and is now watching SNL feat. Ellen Page.
wants the Ghetto Burger from Atlanta, GA: http://tinyurl.com/8m3uqn
is watching 30 Rock S03E06. Christmas special!
"Embrace your race, for you cannot erase your face."
feels ugly.
"I really like the bridges and I thought that Madison was an excellent county."
is watching the Knights of Prosperity.
"Were you born with a silver spoon in your mouth? Me neither. I was born with a plastic spork. IN MY ASS."
SNL with Steve Carell, 97.8%!
10 ruthless rock managers: http://tinyurl.com/6uy7jh
The stories behind 20 Muppet favorites: http://tinyurl.com/7roku4
My down speeds are off the hook, muthafckas!
Tagged by Faye: Top 10 of '08 (http://tinyurl.com/94mmf8) I tag @_ochre, @kosherjellyfish and @tsuei.
So cringe-worthy, but so good.
